item.title: Alert Boxes
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Alert Boxes are useful when you want to display notice, important information message to your visitors. You can also add HTML, text or shortcode to its content.

This is an example of General alert box

This is an example of Error alert box

This is an example of Success alert box

This is an example of Notice alert box

item.title: Pricing Tables
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
• Personal
  • $199
  • Half Day Event
  • 10 Printed High-res Images
  • 1 Framed Images
  • 2 Outfit Changes
  • Up to 100 High-res Images on CD
  • 1 Photographer
  • Contact Now
  • Group
  • $399
  • Full Day Event
  • 50 Printed High-res Images
  • 5 Framed Images
  • 5 Outfit Changes
  • Up to 300 High-res Images on CD
  • 1-2 Photographer(s)
  • Contact Now



Light Skin (Up to 4 Columns)

  • $199
  • Half Day Event
  • 10 Printed High-res Images
  • 1 Framed Images
  • 2 Outfit Changes
  • Up to 100 High-res Images on CD
  • 1 Photographer
  • Contact Now

  • Full Day Event

  • 5 Outfit Changes

item.title: Content Builder
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Build your own layouts with content builder

Theme comes with a drag&drop content builder which helps you to build various layouts and contents. You can use easy to use drag&drop user interface to place elements and contents you like. You can also easily import demo site page layout too.

item.title: Theme Support & Updates
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Free Support & Updates

When you purchased theme you get free theme support and updates. We are very focus to offer best support experience possible for you and you always doing that. We provide our own support portal and searchable theme documentation. Our support staffs usually answer all tickets within less than 24 hours.

item.title: Demo Content Import
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
One Click Import

For WordPress beginner. It might not be easy to start setting up site so we provide import functionality to theme. You can import all demo contents in just single click, it’s not only demo contents are imported but also customisation settings as well.

item.title: 28 Gallery Templates
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Gallery Templates Layouts

Theme comes with multiple gallery templates layouts for different purposes. You can choose to display fullscreen slideshow, parallax, flow, masonry and classic gallery columns or even mixes between various gallery layouts.

item.title: 19 Portfolio Templates
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Portfolio Templates Layouts

Theme comes with multiple portfolio templates layouts for different purposes. You can choose to display fullscreen slideshow, parallax, masonry and classic portfolio columns or even mixes between various portfolio layouts.

item.title: 6 Blog Templates
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
6 Blog Layouts

Theme comes with multiple blog layouts for different purposes. You can use blog templates to display news update, blog post or news. It has various layouts including full width, grid and with sidebar option.

item.title: Flexible Single Post Options
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Single Post Layouts, gallery and media support

Theme comes with multiple single blog post layouts for different purposes. You can display post content with images, gallery slideshow or with other video sources ex. Youtube, Vimeo

item.title: Amazing Portfolio Contents
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Creat amazing portfolio content with content builder

Theme comes with a drag&drop content builder which helps you to build various layouts and contents. You can use easy to use drag&drop user interface to place elements and contents you like. So it's easy for you to create amazing portfolio content just like demo site you saw here.

item.title: Custom Sidebar
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Custom Sidebar

Theme has predefined sidebars but if you want to create a new one for other purpose. You can easily do that via our theme admin panel. Once you created a new sidebar, you can customise its widgets & contents via WordPress widgets page.

item.title: Instant Search
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Instant Search

To help your site visitor find what they are looking for in very fast way is to use instant search. So it searches your site contents while visitors are typing and displays results instantly. Visitors can click to page/post to view content or view full search result page.

item.title: Theme Customizer
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Theme Customizer

Customise everything in the theme via customizer and it previews your changes instantly. Other themes might have support some parts and you have to switch between customiser and theme setting. But we are the theme which fully built every cusomisable options into WordPress customiser

item.title: Side Menu
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Side Menu

Theme has 4 menu options main, top bar, footer and side menus. With side menu you can organise each menu items and it’s primary menu for mobile devices. You can also add widgets to its sidebar.

item.title: One Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
One Page

Theme provide support for you to create modern one page parallax site or micro site, you can also create micro site for your sub pages easily using drag&drop content builder with custom menu system.

item.title: Google Mobile Friendly
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Compatible Google Mobile Friendly

Not only theme provide responsive layout. It also pass Google mobile compatibility check for best mobile experience and also great for SEO ranking for you website.

item.title: Woocommerce Support
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Open Your Photography Shop

Theme is Woocommerce compatible and provide flexible shop layout support fullwidth or with sidebar templates. You can easily create and maintain your online shop. For example photography & Phoro frame shop.

item.title: Theme Admin
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [caption id="attachment_3543" align="aligncenter" width="695"] Theme Setting > General for contact form settings, google map, captcha and custom sidebar[/caption] [caption id="attachment_3545" align="aligncenter" width="696"] Theme Setting > Social Profiles for all social media options[/caption] [caption id="attachment_3549" align="aligncenter" width="693"] Theme Setting > Script for custom CSS and script compression features[/caption] [caption id="attachment_3552" align="aligncenter" width="694"] Theme Setting > Demo Content for content importing feature[/caption] [caption id="attachment_3554" align="aligncenter" width="1004"] Post Options[/caption] [caption id="attachment_3557" align="aligncenter" width="1047"] Page Content Builder Options[/caption] [caption id="attachment_3559" align="aligncenter" width="1046"] Portfolio Content Builder Options[/caption] [caption id="attachment_3561" align="aligncenter" width="1041"] Gallery Admin[/caption] [caption id="attachment_3563" align="aligncenter" width="1040"] Testimonials Options[/caption] [caption id="attachment_3565" align="aligncenter" width="1042"] Team Member Options[/caption] [caption id="attachment_3567" align="aligncenter" width="1051"] Pricing Options[/caption]
